g.text: "sub": "<Telematik-ID from SM(C)-B>", // Subject is the institution
"scope": ... // As required for the Resource Server access
Create DPoP Key Pair (for Token Exchange)
Create DPoP Proof JWT for Token Exchange
DPoP Proof JWT Claims (for Token Exchange):
Create Client Assertion JWT for Token Exchange (for Auth)
Check if client_id is bound to the SM(C)-B identity (sub claim in subject_token)
verify Refresh token and DPoP JWT
Validate DPoP Proof JWT (sig by DPoP_Public_Key, claims)
Generate AS Access Token (AT) and Refresh Token (RT)
AT is bound to DPoP key (cnf.jkt claim)
AT contains claims about client_id and SM(C)-B Identity
The client can handle the error and decide whether to retry or not.
